!Lilith: A present...? What the hell...! Did you think that I would be pleased with such a thing? Did you really think that I could forget this 1,000 years of pain for a simple ornament? That's the way of a Dwarf, isn't it? You people know nothing but worldly goods. Go away! [Quest _221_TestimonyOfProsperity 30368-03.htm|Beg her to give the Mark of Health]
